name: hubble-thing
description: Our entry for NASA Space Apps Challenge 2018
author: Andrew McDonnell & Zachary McDonnell

scripts.bundle: mkdir -p public/lib && browserify --standalone hubble --debug src/index.js -g uglifyify -t [ babelify --global --presets [ @babel/env ] ] -t uglifyify | exorcist public/lib/index.js.map > public/lib/bundle.js
scripts.bundle0: mkdir -p public/lib && browserify --standalone hubble --debug src/index.js > public/lib/bundle.js
scripts.demo: npm run bundle && npm run public && opn http://localhost:8080
scripts.public: copyfiles -u1 src/index.html src/index.css src/assets/* public; copyfiles -u1 src/dedalus.js src/dedalus-web.js public/lib; copyfiles -u2 node_modules/dot/doT.min.js public/lib; copyfiles -u3 node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/lib
scripts.deploy-help: echo 'Warning: Deploy will destroy anything in the working copy not on origin/master...'

//: babel-preset-es2015-script to avoid undefined (this) error in mapshaper (https://stackoverflow.com/a/34983495)
